title: Ticket #3932: Testing moves from master to v8.0 branch
description:
We need to move some of the basic improvements from the master branch into the stable branch. These items are selected for their clear improvement quality.

This time we moved hardened runCondorTools, runcmd and runToolNTimes
check_ins:
